pr_title: DHFPROD-3581: And DHFPROD-3720 - Adding dataservice endpoints to search on facet values

timeline.bodyText: I think this is a good example of where moving this code to a separate private method is a good way to document what it's doing - i.e. "copyTestIndexesFileToProject".
timeline.author: rjrudin

timeline.bodyText: If this file can't be copied, then the tests that depend on it are going to fail. Best to throw an exception now as opposed to letting the system be in a misconfigured state - e.g. throw new RuntimeException("Unable to copy test indexes file to project", ioe);
timeline.author: rjrudin

timeline.message: DHFPROD-3581: Search within a specific facet of string datatype
